title: Collaborative Creative Learning Design: Project-Based Social Innovation Solution Development for [K-12]

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science knowledge, collaboration tool proficiency, digital literacy
context.additional_context: Most learners are job seekers requiring strengthened practical competencies to address social issues.

learning_goals: Through team-based projects, learners can design creative solutions to real-world community problems.
Learners can systematically document and share knowledge-creation processes using various digital collaboration tools.
Learners can refine solutions through iterative prototyping incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
